## üëã Hi there, I'm Shakirul Hasan Khan

I'm a software engineer at Re:cruit, specializing in front-end heavy applications using ReactJS, NextJS, and Typescript. With professional experience in two companies and freelance work, I'm passionate about exploring new technologies and solving complex problems. Other than web development I've worked on pet projects in areas like machine learning, game development, web scraping, automation, and CLI tools. I also have a good grasp of data structures and algorithms, solving programming problems on platforms like LeetCode and Codeforces.

## Currently Learning and Interested On

- Designing sarge scale applications üåè
- Low level programming (Rust) ü¶Ä
- Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning ü§ñ
